name: FHIR Repository
description: The FHIR Repository Connector allows you to connect to a FHIR repository/store and perform standard FHIR interactions.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Init configuration for FHIR repository connector.

operations.name: batch
operations.description: Create a new FHIR bundle.

operations.name: connect
operations.description: Proxies a FHIR repository so that any type of API requests are routed intelligently.

operations.name: create
operations.description: Create a new resource with a server-assigned ID.

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Delete a resource.

operations.name: getCapabilityStatement
operations.description: Get a capability statement for the system.

operations.name: patch
operations.description: Update an existing resource by posting a set of changes to it.

operations.name: readById
operations.description: Retrieve a resource using its ID.

operations.name: search
operations.description: Search resources by providing query parameters.

operations.name: update
operations.description: Update an existing resource by its ID.

operations.name: vread
operations.description: Read the state of a specific version of the resource.
